names.placeOfBirth: New York City, New York, USA
names.bio: Bob Kane was born on October 24, 1915 in New York City, New York, USA as Robert Kahn. He is known for his work on The Dark Knight (2008), The Dark Knight Rises (2012) and Batman Begins (2005). He was married to Elizabeth Sanders. He died on November 3, 1998 in Los Angeles, California, USA.
names.name: Bob Kane
